modName: Executioner or Headsmans Axe Idle Animation
summary: A very simple mod that replaces the axe or warhammer idle animation to the executioners idle animation.
descriptionHtml:
A very simple mod that replaces the axe or warhammer idle animation to the executioners idle animation.

I liked this animation because it looks allot more relaxed than the original animation.

Warning!
[size=2]This mod has extreme issues with clipping. I understand this is not the most ideal animation. The animation doesn't clip with large or long axes such as the Headsman's axe or the ebony axe (Maybe daedric)[/size][b][u]Installation
[/u][/b]Place the Data folder into your Skyrim installation folder and when it asks to merge the folder click yes and replace the files if necessary.




[size=6]HAPPY EXECUTING :D[/size]
author: tomtomsatnav1234
